page.title: 18Family life/A policemans day
page.content: {Family life on a saturday that we go down to the recreation park where my little brother plays on the swings that are there.Then after that we slowly walk through the village back home. We watched t.v until 12:00 clock when we all went to bed. {A policeman's day in Dalston on Orton road because he was acting strangely .Mr Blaire asked him his name and address and checked to make sure it was right.He checked all the buildings around the area. 12.15am Mr Blaire left Bunkers Hill. 12.30 Mr Blaire came back into Dalston and walked around the schools and shops to make sure they were alright. 1.30 Mr Blaire went to bed. 9.30 Mr Blaire went back on duty.
